title: Looking For People To Join SaturdayNightCinemas
body:
G'day Boys & Girls,

My name is TurtIe The Cat and I'm looking for a team of five to compete in LoL seriously. Keep reading if you do or have the following:
- On consistently
- Have a communication program to speak with the team
- Going to talk
- Gold or above

If your here you should have passed in all the requirements or you just skipped that (you rebel x). This team will be competing in tournaments on every 2nd Saturday for RP prizes and Triumphant Ryze and will be playing ranked 5v5 to obtain higher elos. Please contact me if you're ready to play and want to get the RP flowing in and feel like making friends with complete strangers. Keep bright on the fields of Justice.

If you want to register please leave the following information:
- Role:
- Division:
- Age:
- Communication Program:
- Preferred Champions:

Thanks, I will add you if I like the look of your beef. Be here in a {{summoner:4}} before someone else takes your spot :o

replies.body:
Season 3 Plat 4 Support Main decayed to plat 5, Have been told by fair few challenger team mates over time that I could make it to diamond if put the time in to it, But I really just can't be bothered dealing with solo queue as a support main.

Season 4 I didn't really play ranked at all, Joining solo queue and yolo troll picked and lost about 7-8 games, Got put in silver 3 for the lols, Due to work didnt play really consistently but the past few weeks i started climbing again got bored, silver 1 , probably try for plat next week again.

But anyway, Been playing since season 2, Pretty much just support main Thresh-Janna-Blitz-Braum-Alistar--Leona-Annie-Zyra, But I can play adc aswell mainly Jinx/Cait, I have a high understanding of game mechanics, timers, trades coming from a 5 year stint of playing dota i came into league pretty fresh and foudn the game pretty easy

I can play Ori mid, And other roles are pretty sub par. Usually keeep them to normals.
-Name: R3demption
- Role: Support
- Division: Plat 4 S3 / G5 Season 4 due to inactivity
- Age: 23
- Communication Program: Vent/Curse voice/Skype/Teamspeak
- Preferred Champions: From best to worst probably Thresh-Janna-Blitz-Braum-Alistar-Nami-Leona-Annie-Zyra , Worst being based on  experience not mechanics or skill wise.

Ign:Borisdec
Rank: Gold 3
Age 24
Role: I'm a support main.
Skype, team speak, vent, curse voice, any really.
Preferred Champions: Leona, Sona. Can play most support champs decently, Currently trying to master Thresh and Nami

Available every night.

IGN: thatzwhatshezed
Rank: Gold
Age: 17
Role: Mid/Top/Adc but can play all roles comfortably.
Top: Riven, Nasus, Jax, Shyvanna, Zed, Akali, aatrox, gnar and renekton.
Mid: Zed, Fizz, Akali, Diana, Ryze (learning Leblanc and ahri atm)
ADC: Vayne, Varus, Draven and twitch. 
I play most night and am available to use all communication programs.

- Role: Support
- Division: Gold 2
- Age: 16
- Communication Program: Ts/Skype/Curse 
- Preferred Champions: Sona, Leona, Thresh, Braum, Janna, Blitz, Nami

IGN: ThatsWotSheZed

Age: 16 (Mature tho x))
Communication Program: Skype, teamspeak, curse voice, fb, etc.
Preferred Champions: Big champion pool (Prefer assasins - zed, LB, Ahri.

P.s. Loved the flash pun huehue

Original Chief
